title: Premade surrendering
body: Provisional game(S-IV to S-III so not so crucial) Played jungle({{champion:5}} ) and was paired with a pre-made 4. They seemed pretty good at first and we generally got ahead early, but when it came time to close out the game they squandered our lead a bit, nothing too stupid but the oppostion({{champion:98}}{{champion:54}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:267}}  ) had a better team fight than us ({{champion:48}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:201}} ) I was in the process of directing us how we were going to finish When the surrender vote came up, obviously I said 'no' as we were going to win and assumed it was called up by someone out of frustration but then the game ended. I had been overruled, because I was not in the group, I was ganged up upon. Riot I am not happy, I'm sure this is rare, however it just happened, and I am left dumbfounded. I don't want to ask for my loss to be removed, I don't want them reported(although i wouldn't argue if they were) what I want if mesures in place so this can't happen again, I am not sure how, but this cannot be allowed to repeat itself.

replies.body: As much as it sucks unfortunately they were the majority, that said Solo queue is in the process of being made (Though they have said it will be a while) so that would stop this from being able to happen.
